lead_paragraph: I would invite your attention to the fact that an editorial of yours captioned "Lieutenant General McNair," which appeared on April 27, contains the statement: "In the First World War he was the youngest brigadier general."
snippet: I would invite your attention to the fact that an editorial of yours captioned "Lieutenant General McNair," which appeared on April 27, contains the statement: "In the First World War he was the youngest brigadier general."...
